title: Taylor Swift Says Travis Kelce Had Her Engagement Ring a ‘Long Time’ Before Proposing: ‘I Look at It Constantly’
summary: She also recalled how the tight end set up a "ruse" so that she wouldn't find out about the proposal.
body: Even Taylor Swift still can’t believe she’s engaged, much less that fiancé Travis Kelce designed the perfect diamond ring for her while keeping it a secret for a “really long time” before he proposed. Related A Timeline of Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce’s Relationship Taylor Swift’s ‘The Life of a Showgirl’: All 12 Tracks Ranked Watch Jason Kelce Ask Travis Kelce Point-Blank the No. 1 Question Fans Have About Taylor Swift During a Monday night (Oct. 6) interview with Jimmy Fallon on The Tonight Show , the pop star gushed about how the Kansas City Chiefs tight end pulled off his August proposal, marveling at the glitziness of her own ring while flashing it to the audience. “That’s crazy! That is crazy,” she exclaimed. “I look at it constantly.” “He had it for a really long time before he gave it to me, too,” Swift continued of the cushion-cut diamond band, which Kelce designed with jeweler Kindred Lubeck. “It doesn’t feel in any way normal for me. I’m just sort of like, ‘Oh, man! Woah!’ But it’s more than that.” “He’s just m…
